verses.verse: After <WG3326> two <WG1417> days <WG2250> was <WG2258> the feast of the <WG3588> passover, <WG3957> and <WG2532> of unleavened bread: <WG106> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> chief priests <WG749> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> scribes <WG1122> sought <WG2212> how <WG4459> they might take <WG2902> him <WG846> by <WG1722> craft, <WG1388> and put him to death. <WG615>
But <WG1161> they said, <WG3004> Not <WG3361> on <WG1722> the <WG3588> feast <WG1859> day, lest <WG3379> there be <WG2071> an uproar <WG2351> of the <WG3588> people. <WG2992>

And <WG2532> being <WG5607> in <WG1722> Bethany <WG963> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> house <WG3614> of Simon <WG4613> the <WG3588> leper, <WG3015> as he <WG846> sat at meat, <WG2621> there came <WG2064> a woman <WG1135> having <WG2192> an alabaster box <WG211> of ointment <WG3464> of spikenard <WG4101> <WG3487> very precious; <WG4185> and <WG2532> she broke <WG4937> the <WG3588> box, <WG211> and poured <WG2708> it on <WG2596> his <WG846> head. <WG2776>

And <WG1161> there were <WG2258> some <WG5100> that had indignation <WG23> within <WG4314> themselves, <WG1438> and <WG2532> said, <WG3004> Why <WG5101> was this <WG3778> waste <WG684> of the <WG3588> ointment <WG3464> made? <WG1096>

For <WG1063> it <WG5124> might have been <WG1410> sold <WG4097> for more than <WG1883> three hundred <WG5145> pence, <WG1220> and <WG2532> have been given <WG1325> to the <WG3588> poor. <WG4434> And <WG2532> they murmured against <WG1690> her. <WG846>

And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> said, <WG2036> Let her alone; <WG863> <WG846> why <WG5101> trouble <WG3930> <WG2873> ye her? <WG846> she hath wrought <WG2038> a good <WG2570> work <WG2041> on <WG1519> me. <WG1691>

For <WG1063> ye have <WG2192> the <WG3588> poor <WG4434> with <WG3326> you <WG1438> always, <WG3842> and <WG2532> whensoever <WG3752> ye will <WG2309> ye may <WG1410> do <WG4160> them <WG846> good: <WG2095> but <WG1161> me <WG1691> ye have <WG2192> not <WG3756> always. <WG3842>
She hath done <WG4160> what <WG3739> she <WG3778> could: <WG2192> she is come aforehand <WG4301> to anoint <WG3462> my <WG3450> body <WG4983> to <WG1519> the <WG3588> burying. <WG1780>

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> Wheresoever <WG3699> <WG302> this <WG5124> gospel <WG2098> shall be preached <WG2784> throughout <WG1519> the <WG3588> whole <WG3650> world, <WG2889> this also <WG2532> that <WG3739> she <WG3778> hath done <WG4160> shall be spoken of <WG2980> for <WG1519> a memorial <WG3422> of her. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Judas <WG2455> Iscariot, <WG2469> one <WG1520> of the <WG3588> twelve, <WG1427> went <WG565> unto <WG4314> the <WG3588> chief priests, <WG749> to <WG2443> betray <WG3860> him <WG846> unto them. <WG846>

And <WG1161> when they <WG3588> heard <WG191> it, they were glad, <WG5463> and <WG2532> promised <WG1861> to give <WG1325> him <WG846> money. <WG694> And <WG2532> he sought <WG2212> how <WG4459> he might conveniently <WG2122> betray <WG3860> him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> first <WG4413> day <WG2250> of unleavened bread, <WG106> when <WG3753> they killed <WG2380> the <WG3588> passover, <WG3957> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> said <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Where <WG4226> wilt <WG2309> thou that we go <WG565> and prepare <WG2090> that <WG2443> thou mayest eat <WG5315> the <WG3588> passover? <WG3957>

And <WG2532> he sendeth forth <WG649> two <WG1417> of his <WG848> disciples, <WG3101> and <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Go <WG5217> ye into <WG1519> the <WG3588> city, <WG4172> and <WG2532> there shall meet <WG528> you <WG5213> a man <WG444> bearing <WG941> a pitcher <WG2765> of water: <WG5204> follow <WG190> him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> wheresoever <WG3699> <WG1437> he shall go <WG1525> say <WG2036> ye to the <WG3588> goodman of the house, <WG3617> The <WG3588> Master <WG1320> saith, <WG3004> Where <WG4226> is <WG2076> the <WG3588> guestchamber, <WG2646> where <WG3699> I shall eat <WG5315> the <WG3588> passover <WG3957> with <WG3326> my <WG3450> disciples? <WG3101>
And <WG2532> he <WG846> will show <WG1166> you <WG5213> a large <WG3173> upper room <WG508> furnished <WG4766> and prepared: <WG2092> there <WG1563> make ready <WG2090> for us. <WG2254>

And <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> went forth, <WG1831> and <WG2532> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> city, <WG4172> and <WG2532> found <WG2147> as <WG2531> he had said <WG2036> unto them: <WG846> and <WG2532> they made ready <WG2090> the <WG3588> passover. <WG3957>
And <WG2532> in the evening <WG3798> he <WG1096> cometh <WG2064> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> twelve. <WG1427>

And <WG2532> as they <WG846> sat <WG345> and <WG2532> did eat, <WG2068> Jesus <WG2424> said, <WG2036> Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> One <WG1520> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> which eateth <WG2068> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> shall betray <WG3860> me. <WG3165>

And <WG1161> they <WG3588> began <WG756> to be sorrowful, <WG3076> and <WG2532> to say <WG3004> unto him <WG846> one by one, <WG1527> Is <WG3385> it I? <WG1473> and <WG2532> another <WG243> said, Is <WG3385> it I? <WG1473>

And <WG1161> he <WG3588> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> It is one <WG1520> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> twelve, <WG1427> that dippeth <WG1686> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> in <WG1519> the <WG3588> dish. <WG5165>

The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> indeed <WG3303> goeth, <WG5217> as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> of <WG4012> him: <WG846> but <WG1161> woe <WG3759> to that <WG1565> man <WG444> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is betrayed! <WG3860> good <WG2570> were <WG2258> it <WG846> for that <WG1565> man <WG444> if <WG1487> he had never <WG3756> been born. <WG1080>

And <WG2532> as they <WG846> did eat, <WG2068> Jesus <WG2424> took <WG2983> bread, <WG740> and blessed, <WG2127> and broke <WG2806> it, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> to them, <WG846> and <WG2532> said, <WG2036> Take, <WG2983> eat: <WG5315> this <WG5124> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> body. <WG4983>

And <WG2532> he took <WG2983> the <WG3588> cup, <WG4221> and when he had given thanks, <WG2168> he gave <WG1325> it to them: <WG846> and <WG2532> they all <WG3956> drank <WG4095> of <WG1537> it. <WG846>

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> This <WG5124> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> blood <WG129> of <WG3588> the <WG3588> new <WG2537> testament, <WG1242> which is shed <WG1632> for <WG4012> many. <WG4183>

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> I will drink <WG4095> no <WG3364> more <WG3765> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> fruit <WG1081> of the <WG3588> vine, <WG288> until <WG2193> that <WG1565> day <WG2250> that <WG3752> I drink <WG4095> it <WG846> new <WG2537> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>

But <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> said <WG5346> unto him, <WG846> Although <WG2532> <WG1487> all <WG3956> shall be offended, <WG4624> yet <WG235> will not <WG3756> I. <WG1473>

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto thee, <WG4671> That <WG3754> this day, <WG4594> even in <WG1722> this <WG5026> night, <WG3571> before <WG4250> the <WG2228> cock <WG220> crow <WG5455> twice, <WG1364> thou shalt deny <WG533> me <WG3165> thrice. <WG5151>

But <WG1161> he <WG3588> spake <WG3004> the more <WG3123> vehemently, <WG1537> <WG4053> If <WG1437> I <WG3165> should <WG1163> die with <WG4880> thee, <WG4671> I will not deny thee in any wise. <WG3364> <WG533> <WG4571> <WG1161> Likewise <WG5615> also <WG2532> said <WG3004> they all. <WG3956>

And <WG2532> he went forward <WG4281> a little, <WG3397> and fell <WG4098> on <WG1909> the <WG3588> ground, <WG1093> and <WG2532> prayed <WG4336> that, <WG2443> if <WG1487> it were <WG2076> possible, <WG1415> the <WG3588> hour <WG5610> might pass <WG3928> from <WG575> him. <WG846>

Watch <WG1127> ye and <WG2532> pray, <WG4336> lest <WG3363> ye enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> temptation. <WG3986> The <WG3588> spirit <WG4151> truly <WG3303> is ready, <WG4289> but <WG1161> the <WG3588> flesh <WG4561> is weak. <WG772>

Rise up, <WG1453> let us go; <WG71> lo, <WG2400> he that betrayeth <WG3860> me <WG3165> is at hand. <WG1448>

And <WG2532> as soon as he was come, <WG2064> he goeth <WG4334> straightway <WG2112> to him, <WG846> and saith, <WG3004> Master, <WG4461> master; <WG4461> and <WG2532> kissed <WG2705> him. <WG846>
And <WG1161> they <WG3588> laid <WG1911> their <WG848> hands <WG5495> on <WG1909> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> took <WG2902> him. <WG846>

I was <WG2252> daily <WG2596> <WG2250> with <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> temple <WG2411> teaching, <WG1321> and <WG2532> ye took <WG2902> me <WG3165> not: <WG3756> but <WG235> <WG2443> the <WG3588> Scriptures <WG1124> must be fulfilled. <WG4137>

And <WG1161> he <WG3588> left <WG2641> the <WG3588> linen cloth, <WG4616> and fled <WG5343> from <WG575> them <WG846> naked. <WG1131>

And <WG2532> they led Jesus away <WG520> <WG2424> to <WG4314> the <WG3588> high priest: <WG749> and <WG2532> with him <WG846> were assembled <WG4905> all <WG3956> the <WG3588> chief priests <WG749> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> elders <WG4245> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> scribes. <WG1122>

For <WG1063> many <WG4183> bare false witness <WG5576> against <WG2596> him, <WG846> but <WG2532> their <WG846> witness <WG3141> agreed not together. <WG2258> <WG3756> <WG2470>
And <WG2532> there arose <WG450> certain, <WG5100> and bare false witness <WG5576> against <WG2596> him, <WG846> saying, <WG3004>

But <WG2532> neither <WG3761> so <WG3779> did their <WG846> witness <WG3141> agree together. <WG2258> <WG2470>

But <WG1161> he <WG3588> held his peace, <WG4623> and <WG2532> answered <WG611> nothing. <WG3762> Again <WG3825> the <WG3588> high priest <WG749> asked <WG1905> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> said <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Art <WG1488> thou <WG4771> the <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of the <WG3588> Blessed? <WG2128>

Ye have heard <WG191> the <WG3588> blasphemy: <WG988> what <WG5101> think <WG5316> ye? <WG5213> And <WG1161> they <WG3588> all <WG3956> condemned <WG2632> him <WG846> to be <WG1511> guilty <WG1777> of death. <WG2288>

And <WG2532> some <WG5100> began <WG756> to spit on <WG1716> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> to cover <WG4028> his <WG846> face, <WG4383> and <WG2532> to buffet <WG2852> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> to say <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Prophesy: <WG4395> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> servants <WG5257> did strike <WG906> him <WG846> with the palms of their hands. <WG4475>
